text: Is there a way to use `@test_logs` with a function that also throws an error?

elements.text: Is there a way to use
with a function that also throws an error?

text:
```julia> using Test

julia> function f()
           @error "memes"
           error("MEMES!!!")
       end
f (generic function with 1 method)

julia> @testset "memes" begin
           @test_logs (:error, "memes") try f() catch end
       end
Test Summary: | Pass  Total
memes         |    1      1
Test.DefaultTestSet("memes", Any[], 1, false, false)```

julia> using Test

julia> @testset "memes" begin

Test Summary: | Pass  Total
memes         |    1      1
Test.DefaultTestSet("memes", Any[], 1, false, false)

text:
You can also test both conditions:
```julia> @testset "memes" begin
           local ex
           @test_logs (:error, "memes") try f() catch ex end
           @test ex isa ErrorException
       end
Test Summary: | Pass  Total
memes         |    2      2
Test.DefaultTestSet("memes", Any[], 2, false, false)```
